txt.en: You have entered a passage leading to the one-time workshop of Melkólf Stonecarver to search for any mention of Zurr-thurkh, the 'secret road' he may have built as an escape tunnel from the throne room of Durin.
You search through the stack of papers, but find nothing useful.
The word 'Zurr-thurkh' catches your eye. You have found what you sought!
Search the scattered papers for mention of Zurr-thurkh

Pages from the workshop of Melkólf Stonecarver have been scattered all throughout the passage, and you should search them for any mention of Zurr-thurkh, the 'secret road' that might lead into the throne room of Durin.
